mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gentlemen, a meeting of the citizens of this place: having appointed us to correspond with our fellow citizens .. on the subject of the enclosed resolutions [concerning the treaty making powers of the federal government / signed] Richard Adams, Alex. Campbell .. Alexander Quarrier
On Monday the 25th of April
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Richmond (Va.). Citizens.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Resolutions, beginning, "On Monday the 25th of April ... a meeting was held ... at the Capitol in the City of Richmond, when a resolution was proposed ... that Congress would carry that Treaty into full effect ... " laid in.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States.--Treaties, etc., 1789-1797 (Washington)
United States--Foreign relations--Treaties
